/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is flanked by tall buildings, their white facades gleaming under the clear blue sky. The roads are filled with cars and buses, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. Trees line the sides of the street, their green foliage contrasting with the urban environment. The perspective of the image, taken from a low angle, enhances the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky.
